ome.smuggler.jclient.providers.http

Class JsonRestResourceAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ome.smuggler.jclient.providers.http.JsonRestResourceAdapter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RestResource<T>

    public class JsonRestResourceAdapter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements RestResource<T>
    Turns a JsonResource into a RestResource by wrapping errors into RestResourceExceptions.
